Text:
Hey, could you give us a tip as to how you're encoding these?  I've tried to use handbrake to do PSP and iPod compatible movies, but I've failed in all regards.

Any assistance would be really appreciated.

If you use mediainfo u can clearly see that I am using handbrake too :-) Use the ipod settings and u get an pretty okay result. however im not telling u how to get the same results as me.. its my secret lol
